name: The Skatalites
description: '''The Skatalites''' are a [[ska]] band from [[Jamaica]]. They played initially between 1963 and 1965, and recorded many of their best known songs in the period, including "[[Guns of Navarone (song)|Guns of Navarone]]." They also played on records by [[Prince Buster]] and backed many other Jamaican artists who recorded during that period, including [[Bob Marley & The Wailers]], on their first single "[[Simmer Down]]." They reformed in 1983 and have played together ever since.
